band gap energy
Eg

property_source_passage: A special attention was given to maintain the technological parameters of the films during fabrication process. From our experiment, band gap energy of three CuInSe<sub>2</sub> thin films was found to be 1.1 eV having the high values of absorption coefficient which conforms the results of previous experiments by different researchers.
value_source_passage: A special attention was given to maintain the technological parameters of the films during fabrication process.
